        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Spiralfjær</string>
            <string language="en">spiral string</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiralezeichenkette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaîne de caractères en spirale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corda espiral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stringa a spirale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σπειροειδής συμβολοσειρά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cadena espiral</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">utforsk hvor mye en fjær strekker seg ved påheng av ulike vekter.</string>
            <string language="en">Explore how much a spring extends when you attach different weight.</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie, wieviel ein Frühling ausdehnt, 
wenn Sie unterschiedliches Gewicht anbringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorez combien un ressort étend quand vous 
attachez le poids différent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explore quanto uma mola estende quando você unir 
o peso diferente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplori quanto una molla si estende quando fissate
il peso differente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερευνήστε πόσο ένα ελατήριο επεκτείνει όταν 
συνδέετε το διαφορετικό βάρος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explore cuánto amplía un resorte cuando usted 
asocia diverso peso.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
